channel.title: Max Stat Changing
channel.description:
I've come across a problem, I have my max stat set to 200, and I believe that is too high for anyone to attempt getting, and I didn't make it 200, it came at 200 so I don't know how to change it to a lower stat. Can someone please point me in the direction of what file I should look in, and what I should find/look for in that file.
Thanks - Kevin

item.title: Max Stat Changing
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:

ya true ill just set it back to 99 so thers no hassle lol well thanks again

a normal player should be able to reach any level you set it to… but you also need to set the EXP for each level but im not familiar with changing max levels since 99 is best

                                                    	}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {

}

thanks,smerf45[/quote]

item.title: Max Stat Changing
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:3, topic:274880”]In your client class, search for -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } }
Change both 200’s to 99’s.[/quote]

Thank you soo much! It worked like a charm!

Read full topic

item.title: Max Stat Changing
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In your client class, search for -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } }
Change both 200’s to 99’s.

Read full topic
